MASTER
H.264 | AVC | 2880p | PCM 24bit/48kHz | Dolby Atmos | SOFT SUBS .ASS


NOTES:
Based mostly in Apple Music ver & Bugs! Ver. | Enhanced with Topaz Video AI & Davinci Resolve
Syncing the audio was a pain in the ass thanks to the official release & and the MV audio being on a different famerate, was planning on releasing this earlyer but the audio syincing and the lack of time didn't help. ENJOY.
